activities: The information we collect is solely registration data and basic billing data. Registration data is only used to initially register and then later to identify (if necessary) any one of our users. Basic billing date (i.e. name, address, phone number) is used for anti-fraud purposes. Collected data is only shared between the EU office and the US office.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline data, online data, customer data, manually processed data
recoursemech: For data other than organization human resources data: CBBB EU Safe Harbor Program
